Overly rigid adherence to routines and schedules

questions.question: A client presents with chronic fatigue, feelings of worthlessness, and digestive issues. Based on the case studies, which chakra(s) would be the MOST relevant to assess and address FIRST?
questions.explanation: The Root and Solar Plexus Chakras are most relevant due to their association with grounding, energy, self-worth, and digestive function.
